# 1 Math derivation


$$ P(A) = 1 - \frac{_{365}P_n}{365^n} $$


# 2 Reformulation for lfactorial and lchoose

$$ P(B) = \frac{_{365}P_n}{365^n} $$

$$ P(B)) = \frac{365!}{(365-n)!log365^n} $$
$$ log(P(B)) = log(\frac{365!}{(365-n)!log365^n}) $$
$$ log(P(B)) = log(365!) - {log((365-n)!) - n log(365)} $$
$$ log(P(B)) = lfacotrial(365) - {lfacotrial(365-n) - n log(365)} $$
$$ P(A) = 1 - exp(log(P(B))) $$
$$ P(A) = 1 - exp(lfacotrial(365) - lfacotrial(365-n) - n log(365)) $$

# 3

P(A) = 1 - exp(lfactorial(365) - lfactorial(365-n) - n*log(365))

# 4

```{r}
1 - exp(lfactorial(365) - lfactorial(365-23) - 23*log(365))
```
